director.name: 丹斯加·彭西迪佛拉高 Thunska Pansittivorakul

playdate: 2023-11-10(阿姆斯特丹国际纪录片影展)
this_title: ไม่พึงปรารถนา
introduction: This documentary, composed of various video clips and footage, is an exploration to search for some missing jigsaw pieces in history. Something that turned someone into a hero, or an absolute jerk. Some things are hidden under the carpet, from Hiroshima to Teresa Teng to the Space Race, an Olympic and the moon.源自：https://dmzdocs.com/eng/addon/00000001/program_view.asp?m_idx=102828&QueryYear=2023&c_idx=236&QueryType=B&QueryStep=2
foreign_title: ไม่พึงปรารถนา
